mapper.select: select * from pjtourtalk where travelIdx = #{travelIdx} order by tourTalkIdx desc
mapper.insert: insert into pjtourtalk (userId, tourTalkContent, tourTalkReg, travelIdx) values(#{userId},#{tourTalkContent},now(),#{travelIdx})
INSERT INTO report (reporter, writer, reportContent, tourTalkIdx, reportReg) VALUES (#{reporter}, #{writer}, #{reportContent}, #{tourTalkIdx}, NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE pjtourtalk SET hit = hit + 1, active = CASE WHEN hit + 1 >= 3 THEN 1 ELSE active END WHERE tourTalkIdx = #{tourTalkIdx}
